34 
43 bitpit::IBinaryStream& operator>>(bitpit::IBinaryStream &buffer, bitpit::Octant &octant)
44 {
45  uint8_t dimensions;
46  buffer >> dimensions;
47 
48  uint8_t level;
49  buffer >> level;
50 
51  octant.initialize(dimensions, level, true);
52 
53  buffer >> octant.m_x;
54  buffer >> octant.m_y;
55  buffer >> octant.m_z;
56 
57  buffer >> octant.m_marker;
58 
59  buffer >> octant.m_ghost;
60 
61  for(int i = 0; i < bitpit::Octant::INFO_ITEM_COUNT; ++i){
62  bool value;
63  buffer >> value;
64  octant.m_info[i] = value;
65  }
66 
67  return buffer;
68 }
69 
78 bitpit::OBinaryStream& operator<<(bitpit::OBinaryStream &buffer, const bitpit::Octant &octant)
79 {
80  buffer << octant.m_dim;
81  buffer << octant.m_level;
82 
83  buffer << octant.m_x;
84  buffer << octant.m_y;
85  buffer << octant.m_z;
86 
87  buffer << octant.m_marker;
88 
89  buffer << octant.m_ghost;
90 
91  for(int i = 0; i < bitpit::Octant::INFO_ITEM_COUNT; ++i){
92  buffer << (bool) octant.m_info[i];
93  }
94 
95  return buffer;
96 }

121 Octant::Octant(){
122  initialize();

129 Octant::Octant(uint8_t dim){
130  initialize(dim, 0, true);
131 };
132 
141 Octant::Octant(uint8_t dim, uint8_t level, int32_t x, int32_t y, int32_t z){
142  initialize(dim, level, true);
143 
144  // Set the coordinates
145  m_x = x;
146  m_y = y;
147  m_z = (m_dim-2) * z;
148 };
149 
159 Octant::Octant(bool bound, uint8_t dim, uint8_t level, int32_t x, int32_t y, int32_t z){
160  initialize(dim, level, bound);
161 
162  // Set the coordinates
163  m_x = x;
164  m_y = y;
165  m_z = (m_dim-2) * z;
166 };
167 
170 bool Octant::operator ==(const Octant & oct2){
171  bool check = true;
172  check = check && (m_dim == oct2.m_dim);
173  check = check && (m_x == oct2.m_x);
174  check = check && (m_y == oct2.m_y);
175  check = check && (m_z == oct2.m_z);
176  check = check && (m_level == oct2.m_level);
177  return check;
178 }

183 
186 void
187 Octant::initialize() {
188  initialize(0, 0, false);
189 }
190 
196 void
197 Octant::initialize(uint8_t dim, uint8_t level, bool bound) {
198  m_dim = dim;
199  m_level = level;
200 
201  // Reset the marker
202  m_marker = 0;
203 
204  // Set the coordinates
205  m_x = 0;
206  m_y = 0;
207  m_z = 0;
208 
209  // Initialize octant info
210  m_info.reset();
211  m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BALANCED] = true;
212  m_ghost = -1;
213 
214  // If this is the root octant we need to set the boundary condition bound
215  // for faces
216  if (m_dim >= 2 && m_level == 0) {
217  uint8_t nf = m_dim*2;
218  for (uint8_t i=0; i<nf; i++){
219  m_info[i] = bound;
220  }
221  }
222 };

301 bool
302 Octant::getEdgeBound(uint8_t edge) const{
303  for (int face : sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeFace[edge]) {
304  if (getBound(face)) {
305  return true;
306  }
307  }
308 
309  return false;
310 };
311 
316 bool
317 Octant::getNodeBound(uint8_t node) const{
318  for (int face : sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFace[node]) {
319  if (getBound(face)) {
320  return true;
321  }
322  }
323 
324  return false;
325 };
326 
330 bool
331 Octant::getBound() const{
332  for (int i = 0; i < sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nFaces; ++i) {
333  if (getBound(i)) {
334  return true;
335  }
336  }
337 
338  return false;
339 };

405 void
406 Octant::setMarker(int8_t marker){
407  if (marker != m_marker)
408  m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_AUX] = true;
409  this->m_marker = marker;
410 };
411 
415 void
416 Octant::setBalance(bool balance){
417  if (balance != m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BALANCED])
418  m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_AUX] = true;
419  m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BALANCED] = balance;
420 };

477 // =================================================================================== //
478 
482 darray3
483 Octant::getLogicalCenter() const{
484  double dh;
485  darray3 center;
486 
487  dh = double(getLogicalSize())*0.5;
488  center[0] = (double)m_x + dh;
489  center[1] = (double)m_y + dh;
490  center[2] = (double)m_z + double(m_dim-2)*dh;
491  return center;
492 };
493 
494 // =================================================================================== //
495 
500 darray3
501 Octant::getLogicalFaceCenter(uint8_t iface) const{
502  double dh_2;
503  darray3 center;
504 
505  assert(iface < m_dim*2);
506 
507  dh_2 = double(getLogicalSize())*0.5;
508  center[0] = (double)m_x + (double)sm_treeConstants[m_dim].faceDisplacements[iface][0] * dh_2;
509  center[1] = (double)m_y + (double)sm_treeConstants[m_dim].faceDisplacements[iface][1] * dh_2;
510  center[2] = (double)m_z + double(m_dim-2) * (double)sm_treeConstants[m_dim].faceDisplacements[iface][2] * dh_2;
511 
512  return center;
513 };
514 
515 // =================================================================================== //
516 
521 darray3
522 Octant::getLogicalEdgeCenter(uint8_t iedge) const{
523  double dh_2;
524  darray3 center;
525 
526  dh_2 = double(getLogicalSize())*0.5;
527  center[0] = (double)m_x + (double)sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeDisplacements[iedge][0] * dh_2;
528  center[1] = (double)m_y + (double)sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeDisplacements[iedge][1] * dh_2;
529  center[2] = (double)m_z + double(m_dim-2) * (double)sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeDisplacements[iedge][2] * dh_2;
530  return center;
531 };
532 
533 // =================================================================================== //
534 
538 void
539 Octant::getLogicalNodes(u32arr3vector & nodes) const{
540  uint8_t i;
541  uint32_t dh;
542  uint8_t nn = uint8_t(1)<<m_dim;
543 
544  dh = getLogicalSize();
545  nodes.resize(nn);
546 
547  for (i = 0; i < nn; i++){
548  nodes[i][0] = m_x + uint32_t(sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[i][0])*dh;
549  nodes[i][1] = m_y + uint32_t(sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[i][1])*dh;
550  nodes[i][2] = m_z + uint32_t(sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[i][2])*dh;
551  }
552 };
553 
557 u32arr3vector
558 Octant::getLogicalNodes() const{
559  uint8_t i;
560  uint32_t dh;
561  uint8_t nn = uint8_t(1)<<m_dim;
562  u32arr3vector nodes;
563 
564  dh = getLogicalSize();
565  nodes.resize(nn);
566 
567  for (i = 0; i < nn; i++){
568  nodes[i][0] = m_x + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[i][0]*dh;
569  nodes[i][1] = m_y + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[i][1]*dh;
570  nodes[i][2] = m_z + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[i][2]*dh;
571  }
572 
573  return nodes;
574 };
575 
580 void Octant::getLogicalNode(u32array3 & node, uint8_t inode) const{
581  uint32_t dh;
582 
583  dh = getLogicalSize();
584  node[0] = m_x + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[inode][0]*dh;
585  node[1] = m_y + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[inode][1]*dh;
586  node[2] = m_z + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[inode][2]*dh;
587 
588 };
589 
594 u32array3 Octant::getLogicalNode(uint8_t inode) const{
595  u32array3 node;
596  uint32_t dh;
597 
598  dh = getLogicalSize();
599  node[0] = m_x + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[inode][0]*dh;
600  node[1] = m_y + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[inode][1]*dh;
601  node[2] = m_z + sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeCoordinates[inode][2]*dh;
602  return node;
603 };
604 
610 void Octant::getNormal(uint8_t iface, i8array3 & normal, const int8_t (&normals)[6][3]) const{
611  uint8_t i;
612  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++){
613  normal[i] = normals[iface][i];
614  }
615 };

621 uint64_t Octant::computeMorton() const{
622  uint64_t morton = 0;
623  morton = PABLO::computeMorton(this->m_x,this->m_y,this->m_z);
624  return morton;
625 };
626 
631 uint64_t Octant::computeNodeMorton(uint8_t inode) const{
632 
633  u32array3 node = getLogicalNode(inode);
634 
635  return computeNodeMorton(node);
636 };
637 
641 uint64_t Octant::computeFatherMorton() const {
642  u32array3 fatherCoordinates = computeFatherCoordinates();
643  return PABLO::computeMorton(fatherCoordinates[0], fatherCoordinates[1], fatherCoordinates[2]);
644 };
645 
651 u32array3 Octant::computeFatherCoordinates() const {
652  u32array3 fatherCoordinates = {{m_x, m_y, m_z}};
653  for (int i=0; i<m_dim; i++){
654  fatherCoordinates[i] -= fatherCoordinates[i]%(uint32_t(1) << (TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL - max(0,(m_level-1))));
655  }
656  return fatherCoordinates;
657 };
658 
663 uint64_t Octant::computeNodeMorton(const u32array3 &node) const{
664 
665  return PABLO::computeXYZKey(node[0], node[1], node[2], TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL);
666 };
667 
671 unsigned int Octant::getBinarySize()
672 {
673  unsigned int binarySize = 0;
674  binarySize += sizeof(uint8_t); // dimensions
675  binarySize += sizeof(uint8_t); // level
676  binarySize += 3 * sizeof(uint32_t); // 3 coordinates
677  binarySize += sizeof(int8_t); // marker
678  binarySize += sizeof(int); // ghost layer
679  binarySize += INFO_ITEM_COUNT * sizeof(bool); // info
680 
681  return binarySize;
682 }
683 
684 // =================================================================================== //
685 // OTHER METHODS
686 // =================================================================================== //
687 
691 Octant Octant::buildLastDesc() const {
692  u32array3 delta = { {0,0,0} };
693  for (int i=0; i<m_dim; i++){
694  delta[i] = (uint32_t(1) << (TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL - m_level)) - 1;
695  }
696  Octant last_desc(m_dim, TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL, (m_x+delta[0]), (m_y+delta[1]), (m_z+delta[2]));
697  return last_desc;
698 };
699 
700 // =================================================================================== //
701 
705 Octant Octant::buildFather() const {
706  u32array3 fatherCoordinates = computeFatherCoordinates();
707  Octant father(m_dim, max(0,m_level-1), fatherCoordinates[0], fatherCoordinates[1], fatherCoordinates[2]);
708  return father;
709 };

711 // =================================================================================== //
712 
716 uint8_t Octant::countChildren() const {
717  if (this->m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL){
718  return sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nChildren;
719  } else {
720  return 0;
721  }
722 }
723 
724 // =================================================================================== //
725 
729 vector< Octant > Octant::buildChildren() const {
730 
731  uint8_t nchildren = countChildren();
732  std::vector< Octant > children(nchildren);
733  buildChildren(children.data());
734 
735  return children;
736 }
737 
738 // =================================================================================== //
739 
745 void Octant::buildChildren(Octant *children) const {
746 
747  int nChildren = countChildren();
748  for (int i=0; i<nChildren; ++i){
749  // Octant information
750  uint8_t xf;
751  uint8_t yf;
752  uint8_t zf;
753  uint8_t dx;
754  uint8_t dy;
755  uint8_t dz;
756  switch (i) {
757 
758  case 0 :
759  dx = 0;
760  dy = 0;
761  dz = 0;
762 
763  xf = 1;
764  yf = 3;
765  zf = 5;
766 
767  break;
768 
769  case 1 :
770  dx = 1;
771  dy = 0;
772  dz = 0;
773 
774  xf = 0;
775  yf = 3;
776  zf = 5;
777 
778  break;
779 
780  case 2 :
781  dx = 0;
782  dy = 1;
783  dz = 0;
784 
785  xf = 1;
786  yf = 2;
787  zf = 5;
788 
789  break;
790 
791  case 3 :
792  dx = 1;
793  dy = 1;
794  dz = 0;
795 
796  xf = 0;
797  yf = 2;
798  zf = 5;
799 
800  break;
801 
802  case 4 :
803  dx = 0;
804  dy = 0;
805  dz = 1;
806 
807  xf = 1;
808  yf = 3;
809  zf = 4;
810 
811  break;
812 
813  case 5 :
814  dx = 1;
815  dy = 0;
816  dz = 1;
817 
818  xf = 0;
819  yf = 3;
820  zf = 4;
821 
822  break;
823 
824  case 6 :
825  dx = 0;
826  dy = 1;
827  dz = 1;
828 
829  xf = 1;
830  yf = 2;
831  zf = 4;
832 
833  break;
834 
835  case 7 :
836  dx = 1;
837  dy = 1;
838  dz = 1;
839 
840  xf = 0;
841  yf = 2;
842  zf = 4;
843 
844  break;
845 
846  default:
847  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("The maximum number of children is 8.");
848 
849  }
850 
851  // Create octant
852  children[i] = Octant(*this);
853  Octant &oct = children[i];
854 
855  oct.setMarker(std::max(0, oct.m_marker - 1));
856  oct.setLevel(oct.m_level + 1);
857 
858  uint32_t dh = oct.getLogicalSize();
859 
860  oct.m_x += dh * dx;
861  oct.m_y += dh * dy;
862  oct.m_z += dh * dz;
863 
864  oct.m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_NEW4REFINEMENT] = true;
865 
866  oct.m_info[INFO_BOUNDFACE0 + xf] = false;
867  oct.m_info[INFO_BOUNDFACE0 + yf] = false;
868  oct.m_info[INFO_BOUNDFACE0 + zf] = false;
869 
870  oct.m_info[INFO_PBOUNDFACE0 + xf] = false;
871  oct.m_info[INFO_PBOUNDFACE0 + yf] = false;
872  oct.m_info[INFO_PBOUNDFACE0 + zf] = false;
873  }
874 };
875 
883 void Octant::computeHalfSizeMortons(uint8_t iface, uint32_t *nMortons, std::vector<uint64_t> *mortons) const {
884 
885  if (m_info[iface]) {
886  *nMortons = 0;
887  mortons->clear();
888  return;
889  }
890 
891  int nchildren = 1<<m_dim;
892  *nMortons = (m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL) ? nchildren/2 : 1;
893  mortons->resize(*nMortons);
894 
895  uint32_t dh = (m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL) ? getLogicalSize()/2 : getLogicalSize();
896  uint32_t dh2 = getLogicalSize();
897  switch (iface) {
898  case 0 :
899  {
900  uint32_t x = m_x - dh;
901  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
902  uint32_t y = m_y + ((i == 1) || (i == 3)) * dh;
903  uint32_t z = m_z + ((m_dim == 3) && ((i == 2) || (i == 3))) * dh;
904 
905  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
906  }
907  }
908  break;
909  case 1 :
910  {
911  uint32_t x = m_x + dh2;
912  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
913  uint32_t y = m_y + ((i == 1) || (i == 3)) * dh;
914  uint32_t z = m_z + ((m_dim == 3) && ((i == 2) || (i == 3))) * dh;
915 
916  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
917  }
918  }
919  break;
920  case 2 :
921  {
922  uint32_t y = m_y - dh;
923  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
924  uint32_t x = m_x + ((i == 1) || (i == 3)) * dh;
925  uint32_t z = m_z + ((m_dim == 3) && ((i == 2) || (i == 3))) * dh;
926 
927  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
928  }
929  }
930  break;
931  case 3 :
932  {
933  uint32_t y = m_y + dh2;
934  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
935  uint32_t x = m_x + ((i == 1) || (i == 3)) * dh;
936  uint32_t z = m_z + ((m_dim == 3) && ((i == 2) || (i == 3))) * dh;
937 
938  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
939  }
940  }
941  break;
942  case 4 :
943  {
944  uint32_t z = m_z - dh;
945  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
946  uint32_t x = m_x + ((i == 1) || (i == 3)) * dh;
947  uint32_t y = m_y + ((i == 2) || (i == 3)) * dh;
948 
949  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
950  }
951  }
952  break;
953  case 5 :
954  {
955  uint32_t z = m_z + dh2;
956  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
957  uint32_t x = m_x + ((i == 1) || (i == 3)) * dh;
958  uint32_t y = m_y + ((i == 2) || (i == 3)) * dh;
959 
960  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
961  }
962  }
963  break;
964  }
965 }
966 
975 void Octant::computeMinSizeMortons(uint8_t iface, uint8_t maxdepth, uint32_t *nMortons, std::vector<uint64_t> *mortons) const {
976 
977  if (m_info[iface]) {
978  *nMortons = 0;
979  mortons->clear();
980  return;
981  }
982 
983  *nMortons = (m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL) ? uint32_t(1)<<((m_dim-1)*(maxdepth-m_level)) : 1;
984  mortons->resize(*nMortons);
985 
986  uint32_t dh = (m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL) ? uint32_t(1)<<(TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL - maxdepth) : getLogicalSize();
987  uint32_t dh2 = getLogicalSize();
988  uint32_t nline = uint32_t(1)<<(maxdepth-m_level);
989  switch (iface) {
990  case 0 :
991  {
992  uint32_t x = m_x - dh;
993  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
994  uint32_t y = m_y + ((m_dim == 2) * (i % nline) + (m_dim - 2) * (i / nline)) * dh;
995  uint32_t z = m_z + (m_dim - 2) * (i % nline) * dh;
996 
997  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
998  }
999  }
1000  break;
1001  case 1 :
1002  {
1003  uint32_t x = m_x + dh2;
1004  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
1005  uint32_t y = m_y + ((m_dim == 2) * (i % nline) + (m_dim - 2) * (i / nline)) * dh;
1006  uint32_t z = m_z + (m_dim - 2) * (i % nline) * dh;
1007 
1008  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1009  }
1010  }
1011  break;
1012  case 2 :
1013  {
1014  uint32_t y = m_y - dh;
1015  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
1016  uint32_t x = m_x + ((m_dim == 2) * (i % nline) + (m_dim - 2) * (i / nline)) * dh;
1017  uint32_t z = m_z + (m_dim - 2) * (i % nline) * dh;
1018 
1019  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1020  }
1021  }
1022  break;
1023  case 3 :
1024  {
1025  uint32_t y = m_y + dh2;
1026  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
1027  uint32_t x = m_x + ((m_dim == 2) * (i%nline) + (m_dim - 2) * (i / nline)) * dh;
1028  uint32_t z = m_z + (m_dim - 2) * (i%nline) * dh;
1029 
1030  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1031  }
1032  }
1033  break;
1034  case 4 :
1035  {
1036  uint32_t z = m_z - dh;
1037  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
1038  uint32_t x = m_x + (i / nline) * dh;
1039  uint32_t y = m_y + (i % nline) * dh;
1040 
1041  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1042  }
1043  }
1044  break;
1045  case 5 :
1046  {
1047  uint32_t z = m_z + dh2;
1048  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
1049  uint32_t x = m_x + (i / nline) * dh;
1050  uint32_t y = m_y + (i % nline) * dh;
1051 
1052  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1053  }
1054  }
1055  break;
1056  }
1057 
1058  std::sort(mortons->begin(), mortons->end());
1059 }
1060 
1069 void Octant::computeFaceVirtualMortons(uint8_t iface, uint8_t maxdepth, uint32_t *nMortons, std::vector<uint64_t> *mortons) const {
1070  if (!getBalance()){
1071  computeMinSizeMortons(iface, maxdepth, nMortons, mortons);
1072  } else{
1073  computeHalfSizeMortons(iface, nMortons, mortons);
1074  }
1075 }

1085 void Octant::computeEdgeHalfSizeMortons(uint8_t iedge, const uint8_t (&edgeface)[12][2], uint32_t *nMortons, std::vector<uint64_t> *mortons) const {
1086 
1087  uint32_t iface1 = edgeface[iedge][0];
1088  uint32_t iface2 = edgeface[iedge][1];
1089  if (m_info[iface1] || m_info[iface2]) {
1090  *nMortons = 0;
1091  mortons->clear();
1092  return;
1093  }
1094 
1095  *nMortons = (m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL) ? 2 : 1;
1096  mortons->resize(*nMortons);
1097 
1098  uint32_t dh = (m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL) ? getLogicalSize()/2 : getLogicalSize();
1099  uint32_t dh2 = getLogicalSize();
1100 
1101  switch (iedge) {
1102  case 0 :
1103  {
1104  uint32_t x = m_x - dh;
1105  uint32_t z = m_z - dh;
1106  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < *nMortons; ++i) {
1107  uint32_t y = m_y + (i == 1) * dh;
1108

1110  }
1111  }
1112  break;

1114  {

1118  uint32_t y = m_y + (i == 1) * dh;
1119 
1120  (*mortons)[i] = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1121  }
1122  }
1123  break;
1124  case 2 :

1408 void Octant::computeEdgeVirtualMortons(uint8_t iedge, uint8_t maxdepth, const uint8_t balance_codim, const uint8_t (&edgeface)[12][2], uint32_t *nMortons, std::vector<uint64_t> *mortons) const {
1409 
1410  if (getBalance() && balance_codim > 1) {
1411  computeEdgeHalfSizeMortons(iedge, edgeface, nMortons, mortons);
1412  } else{
1413  computeEdgeMinSizeMortons(iedge, maxdepth, edgeface, nMortons, mortons);
1414  }
1415 }

1426 void Octant::computeNodeMinSizeMorton(uint8_t inode, uint8_t maxdepth, const uint8_t (&nodeface)[8][3], bool *hasMorton, uint64_t *morton) const {
1427 
1428  for (int i=0; i<m_dim; i++) {
1429  uint8_t iface = nodeface[inode][i];
1430  if (m_info[iface]) {
1431  *hasMorton = false;
1432  *morton = this->computeMorton();
1433  return;
1434  }
1435  }
1436 
1437  *hasMorton = true;
1438 
1439  uint32_t dh = (m_level < TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL) ? uint32_t(1)<<(TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL - maxdepth) : getLogicalSize();
1440  uint32_t dh2 = getLogicalSize();
1441  switch (inode) {
1442  case 0 :
1443  {
1444  uint32_t x = m_x - dh;
1445  uint32_t y = m_y - dh;
1446  uint32_t z = m_z - (m_dim - 2) * dh;
1447 
1448  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1449  }
1450  break;
1451  case 1 :
1452  {
1453  uint32_t x = m_x + dh2;
1454  uint32_t y = m_y - dh;
1455  uint32_t z = m_z - (m_dim - 2) * dh;
1456 
1457  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1458  }
1459  break;
1460  case 2 :
1461  {
1462  uint32_t x = m_x - dh;
1463  uint32_t y = m_y + dh2;
1464  uint32_t z = m_z - (m_dim - 2) * dh;
1465 
1466  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1467  }
1468  break;
1469  case 3 :
1470  {
1471  uint32_t x = m_x + dh2;
1472  uint32_t y = m_y + dh2;
1473  uint32_t z = m_z - (m_dim - 2) * dh;
1474 
1475  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1476  }
1477  break;
1478  case 4 :
1479  {
1480  uint32_t x = m_x - dh;
1481  uint32_t y = m_y - dh;
1482  uint32_t z = m_z + dh2;
1483 
1484  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1485  }
1486  break;
1487  case 5 :
1488  {
1489  uint32_t x = m_x + dh2;
1490  uint32_t y = m_y - dh;
1491  uint32_t z = m_z + dh2;
1492 
1493  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1494  }
1495  break;
1496  case 6 :
1497  {
1498  uint32_t x = m_x - dh;
1499  uint32_t y = m_y + dh2;
1500  uint32_t z = m_z + dh2;
1501 
1502  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1503  }
1504  break;
1505  case 7 :
1506  {
1507  uint32_t x = m_x + dh2;
1508  uint32_t y = m_y + dh2;
1509  uint32_t z = m_z + dh2;
1510 
1511  *morton = PABLO::computeMorton(x, y, z);
1512  }
1513  break;
1514  default:
1515  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("The maximum number of nodes is 8.");
1516  }
1517 }
1518 
1527 void Octant::computeNodeVirtualMorton(uint8_t inode, uint8_t maxdepth, const uint8_t (&nodeface)[8][3], bool *hasMorton, uint64_t *morton) const {
1528 
1529  computeNodeMinSizeMorton(inode, maxdepth, nodeface, hasMorton, morton);
1530 
1531 }

1538 uint64_t Octant::computePeriodicMorton(uint8_t iface) const {
1539  uint64_t Morton;
1540  uint32_t dh;
1541  dh = getLogicalSize();
1542  uint32_t maxLength = uint32_t(1)<<TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL;
1543 
1544  if (!m_info[iface]){
1545  return this->computeMorton();
1546  }
1547  else{
1548  switch (iface) {
1549  case 0 :
1550  {
1551  Morton = PABLO::computeMorton(maxLength-dh,this->m_y,this->m_z);
1552  }
1553  break;
1554  case 1 :
1555  {
1556  Morton = PABLO::computeMorton(0,this->m_y,this->m_z);
1557  }
1558  break;
1559  case 2 :
1560  {
1561  Morton = PABLO::computeMorton(this->m_x,maxLength-dh,this->m_z);
1562  }
1563  break;
1564  case 3 :
1565  {
1566  Morton = PABLO::computeMorton(this->m_x,0,this->m_z);
1567  }
1568  break;
1569  case 4 :
1570  {
1571  Morton = PABLO::computeMorton(this->m_x,this->m_y,maxLength-dh);
1572  }
1573  break;
1574  case 5 :
1575  {
1576  Morton = PABLO::computeMorton(this->m_x,this->m_y,0);
1577  }
1578  break;
1579  default:
1580  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("The maximum number of faces is 6.");
1581  }
1582  return Morton;
1583  }
1584 };
1585 
1590 Octant Octant::computePeriodicOctant(uint8_t iface) const {
1591  Octant degOct(this->m_dim, this->m_level, this->m_x, this->m_y, this->m_z);
1592  uint32_t maxLength = uint32_t(1)<<TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL;
1593  uint32_t dh = this->getLogicalSize();
1594 
1595  if (!m_info[iface]){
1596  return *this;
1597  }
1598  else{
1599  switch (iface) {
1600  case 0 :
1601  {
1602  degOct.m_x = maxLength-dh;
1603  }
1604  break;
1605  case 1 :
1606  {
1607  degOct.m_x = 0;
1608  }
1609  break;
1610  case 2 :
1611  {
1612  degOct.m_y = maxLength-dh;
1613  }
1614  break;
1615  case 3 :
1616  {
1617  degOct.m_y = 0;
1618  }
1619  break;
1620  case 4 :
1621  {
1622  degOct.m_z = maxLength-dh;
1623  }
1624  break;
1625  case 5 :
1626  {
1627  degOct.m_z = 0;
1628  }
1629  break;
1630  }
1631  degOct.m_level = this->m_level;
1632  degOct.m_info = false;
1633  return degOct;
1634  }
1635 
1636 };

1643 Octant Octant::computeNodePeriodicOctant(uint8_t inode) const {
1644  Octant degOct(this->m_dim, this->m_level, this->m_x, this->m_y, this->m_z);
1645  uint32_t maxLength = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].MAX_LENGTH;
1646  uint32_t dh = this->getLogicalSize();
1647 
1648  uint8_t iface1 = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFace[inode][0];
1649  uint8_t iface2 = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFace[inode][1];
1650  uint8_t iface3 = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFace[inode][m_dim-1];
1651 
1652  if (!m_info[iface1] && !m_info[iface2] && !m_info[iface3]){
1653  return *this;
1654  }
1655  else{
1656  switch (iface1) {
1657  case 0 :
1658  {
1659  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE0]){
1660  degOct.m_x = maxLength-dh;
1661  }
1662  else{
1663  degOct.m_x -= dh;
1664  }
1665  }
1666  break;
1667  case 1 :
1668  {
1669  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE1]){
1670  degOct.m_x = 0;
1671  }
1672  else{
1673  degOct.m_x += dh;
1674  }
1675  }
1676  break;
1677  }
1678 
1679  switch (iface2) {
1680  case 2 :
1681  {
1682  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE2]){
1683  degOct.m_y = maxLength-dh;
1684  }
1685  else{
1686  degOct.m_y -= dh;
1687  }
1688  }
1689  break;
1690  case 3 :
1691  {
1692  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE3]){
1693  degOct.m_y = 0;
1694  }
1695  else{
1696  degOct.m_y += dh;
1697  }
1698  }
1699  break;
1700  }
1701 
1702  switch (iface3) {
1703  case 4 :
1704  {
1705  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE4]){
1706  degOct.m_z = maxLength-dh;
1707  }
1708  else{
1709  degOct.m_z -= dh;
1710  }
1711  }
1712  break;
1713  case 5 :
1714  {
1715  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE5]){
1716  degOct.m_z = 0;
1717  }
1718  else{
1719  degOct.m_z += dh;
1720  }
1721  }
1722  break;
1723  }
1724 
1725  degOct.m_level = this->m_level;
1726  degOct.m_info = false;
1727  return degOct;
1728  }
1729 
1730 };
1731 
1737 Octant Octant::computeEdgePeriodicOctant(uint8_t iedge) const {
1738  Octant degOct(this->m_dim, this->m_level, this->m_x, this->m_y, this->m_z);
1739  uint32_t maxLength = uint32_t(1)<<TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL;
1740  uint32_t dh = this->getLogicalSize();
1741 
1742  std::array<uint8_t,2> iface;
1743  iface[0] = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeFace[iedge][0];
1744  iface[1] = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeFace[iedge][1];
1745 
1746  int8_t cxyz[3] = {0,0,0};
1747  for (int idim=0; idim<m_dim; idim++){
1748  cxyz[idim] = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeCoeffs[iedge][idim];
1749  }
1750 
1751  if (!m_info[iface[0]] && !m_info[iface[1]]){
1752  return *this;
1753  }
1754  else{
1755  for (std::size_t i=0; i<2; i++){
1756  switch (iface[i]) {
1757  case 0 :
1758  if (cxyz[0] != 0){
1759  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE0]){
1760  degOct.m_x = maxLength-dh;
1761  }
1762  else{
1763  degOct.m_x -= dh;
1764  }
1765  }
1766  break;
1767  case 1 :
1768  {
1769  if (cxyz[0] != 0){
1770  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE1]){
1771  degOct.m_x = 0;
1772  }
1773  else{
1774  degOct.m_x += dh;
1775  }
1776  }
1777  }
1778  break;
1779  case 2 :
1780  {
1781  if (cxyz[1] != 0){
1782  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE2]){
1783  degOct.m_y = maxLength-dh;
1784  }
1785  else{
1786  degOct.m_y -= dh;
1787  }
1788  }
1789  }
1790  break;
1791  case 3 :
1792  {
1793  if (cxyz[1] != 0){
1794  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE3]){
1795  degOct.m_y = 0;
1796  }
1797  else{
1798  degOct.m_y += dh;
1799  }
1800  }
1801  }
1802  break;
1803  case 4 :
1804  {
1805  if (cxyz[2] != 0){
1806  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE4]){
1807  degOct.m_z = maxLength-dh;
1808  }
1809  else{
1810  degOct.m_z -= dh;
1811  }
1812  }
1813  }
1814  break;
1815  case 5 :
1816  {
1817  if (cxyz[2] != 0){
1818  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE5]){
1819  degOct.m_z = 0;
1820  }
1821  else{
1822  degOct.m_z += dh;
1823  }
1824  }
1825  }
1826  break;
1827  }
1828  } // end loop on i
1829  degOct.m_level = this->m_level;
1830  degOct.m_info = false;
1831  return degOct;
1832  }
1833 
1834 };
1835 
1842 array<int64_t,3> Octant::getPeriodicCoord(uint8_t iface) const {
1843  array<int64_t,3> coord;
1844  coord[0] = this->m_x;
1845  coord[1] = this->m_y;
1846  coord[2] = this->m_z;
1847  int64_t dh = this->getLogicalSize();
1848  int64_t maxLength = int64_t(1)<<TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL;
1849 
1850  switch (iface) {
1851  case 0 :
1852  {
1853  coord[0] = maxLength;
1854  }
1855  break;
1856  case 1 :
1857  {
1858  coord[0] = -dh;
1859  }
1860  break;
1861  case 2 :
1862  {
1863  coord[1] = maxLength;
1864  }
1865  break;
1866  case 3 :
1867  {
1868  coord[1] = -dh;
1869  }
1870  break;
1871  case 4 :
1872  {
1873  coord[2] = maxLength;
1874  }
1875  break;
1876  case 5 :
1877  {
1878  coord[2] = -dh;
1879  }
1880  break;
1881  }
1882  return coord;
1883 
1884 };

1892 array<int64_t,3> Octant::getNodePeriodicCoord(uint8_t inode) const {
1893  array<int64_t,3> coord;
1894  coord[0] = this->m_x;
1895  coord[1] = this->m_y;
1896  coord[2] = this->m_z;
1897  int64_t dh = this->getLogicalSize();
1898  int64_t maxLength = int64_t(1)<<TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL;
1899 
1900  uint8_t iface1 = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFace[inode][0];
1901  uint8_t iface2 = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFace[inode][1];
1902  uint8_t iface3 = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFace[inode][m_dim-1];
1903 
1904  switch (iface1) {
1905  case 0 :
1906  {
1907  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE0]){
1908  coord[0] = maxLength;
1909  }
1910  }
1911  break;
1912  case 1 :
1913  {
1914  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE1]){
1915  coord[0] = -dh;
1916  }
1917  }
1918  break;
1919  }
1920 
1921  switch (iface2) {
1922  case 2 :
1923  {
1924  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE2]){
1925  coord[1] = maxLength;
1926  }
1927  }
1928  break;
1929  case 3 :
1930  {
1931  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE3]){
1932  coord[1] = -dh;
1933  }
1934  }
1935  break;
1936  }
1937 
1938  switch (iface3) {
1939  case 4 :
1940  {
1941  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE4]){
1942  coord[2] = maxLength;
1943  }
1944  }
1945  break;
1946  case 5 :
1947  {
1948  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE5]){
1949  coord[2] = -dh;
1950  }
1951  }
1952  break;
1953  }
1954 
1955  return coord;
1956

1965 array<int64_t,3> Octant::getEdgePeriodicCoord(uint8_t iedge) const {
1966  array<int64_t,3> coord;
1967  coord[0] = this->m_x;
1968  coord[1] = this->m_y;
1969  coord[2] = this->m_z;
1970  int64_t dh = this->getLogicalSize();
1971  int64_t maxLength = int64_t(1)<<TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL;
1972 
1973  std::array<uint8_t,2> iface;
1974  iface[0] = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeFace[iedge][0];
1975  iface[1] = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeFace[iedge][1];
1976 
1977  int8_t cxyz[3] = {0,0,0};
1978  for (int idim=0; idim<m_dim; idim++){
1979  cxyz[idim] = sm_treeConstants[m_dim].edgeCoeffs[iedge][idim];
1980  }
1981 
1982  for (std::size_t i=0; i<2; i++){
1983  switch (iface[i]) {
1984  case 0 :
1985  {
1986  if (cxyz[0] != 0){
1987  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE0]){
1988  coord[0] = maxLength;
1989  }
1990  }
1991  }
1992  break;
1993  case 1 :
1994  {
1995  if (cxyz[0] != 0){
1996  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE1]){
1997  coord[0] = -dh;
1998  }
1999  }
2000  }
2001  break;
2002  case 2 :
2003  {
2004  if (cxyz[1] != 0){
2005  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE2]){
2006  coord[1] = maxLength;
2007  }
2008  }
2009  }
2010  break;
2011  case 3 :
2012  {
2013  if (cxyz[1] != 0){
2014  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE3]){
2015  coord[1] = -dh;
2016  }
2017  }
2018  }
2019  break;
2020  case 4 :
2021  {
2022  if (cxyz[2] != 0){
2023  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE4]){
2024  coord[2] = maxLength;
2025  }
2026  }
2027  }
2028  break;
2029  case 5 :
2030  {
2031  if (cxyz[2] != 0){
2032  if (m_info[OctantInfo::INFO_BOUNDFACE5]){
2033  coord[2] = -dh;
2034  }
2035  }
2036  }
2037  break;
2038  }
2039  } // end loop on i
2040  return coord;
2041

2048 uint8_t Octant::getFamilySplittingNode() const {
2049 
2050  bool delta[3];
2051  uint32_t xx[3];
2052  xx[0] = m_x;
2053  xx[1] = m_y;
2054  xx[2] = m_z;
2055  delta[2] = 0;
2056  //Delta to build father (use the boolean negation to identify the splitting node)
2057  for (int i=0; i<m_dim; i++){
2058  delta[i] = ((xx[i]%(uint32_t(1) << (TreeConstants::MAX_LEVEL - max(0,(m_level-1))))) == 0);
2059  }
2060  return sm_treeConstants[m_dim].nodeFromCoordinates[delta[0]][delta[1]][delta[2]];
2061 };
